en: LUM is open for business. Only visits scheduled by appointments are allowed.
es: LUM está abierto para los negocios. Solo se permiten visitas programadas con cita previa.

en: Check the PFLAG Facebook page for the most up to date information.
es:
Debido al COVID-19, actualmente todos los grupos de apoyo se realizan a través de Zoom.
Consulte la página de Facebook de PFLAG para obtener la información más actualizada.

en: The Bell Flower Clinic is by appointment only. They are now offering the option to schedule appointments beyond the same day. Surgical Masks are required to be worn. Please be aware that appointment availability will vary day-to-day. For an appointment, please call 317-221-8300.
es: La Clínica Bell Flower es solo con cita previa. Ahora están ofreciendo la opción de programar citas más allá del mismo día. Se requiere el uso de mascarillas quirúrgicas. Tenga en cuenta que la disponibilidad de citas variará de un día a otro. Para programar una cita, llame al 317-221-8300.

en: Due to COVID-19, many programs are currently suspended until further notice, including free immigration consultations. See services for more information
es: Debido a COVID-19, muchos programas están suspendidos. Consulte los servicios para obtener más información.

en: HACES has reopened their doors to clients by appointment only. Masks are required and COVID-19 resources are available 9:00am-5:30pm.
SEIINAC's WhatsApp line is open 24/7. They can also be reached on their Facebook page @seiinac through Messenger.
es: El línea de WhatsApp de SEIINAC está disponsible las 24 horas del día. También puede contactarlos por Facebook en su página @seiinac a través de Messenger.

en:
They have a limited number of staff in the Agency building at any one time and continue increased cleaning and disinfection efforts. They also continue to practice the CDC’s recommended guidelines for workplace safety, social distancing, and personal hygiene measures and encourage everyone do to the same.
FCS appreciates your understanding as they strive to reduce risks for all their clients and staff.
es:
Tienen un número limitado de personal en el edificio de la Agencia en cualquier momento y continúan aumentando los esfuerzos de limpieza y desinfección. También continúan practicando las pautas recomendadas por los CDC para la seguridad en el lugar de trabajo, el distanciamiento social y las medidas de higiene personal y alientan a todes a hacer lo mismo.
FCS agradece su comprensión mientras se esfuerzan por reducir los riesgos para todes sus clientes y personal.

en: Due to COVID-19, SERY is limiting in-person services to appointments only. Schedule an appointment at 450-777-7213. Several services and events are being offered virtually.
Some events cancelled or altered due to COVID-19.
es: Algunos eventos cancelados o alterados debido a COVID-19.

en: BLMP is providing cash assistance to Black LGBTQ+ migrants and first generation people dealing with the impact of COVID-19.

Due to COVID-19, events are currently being held online via Zoom. Their individual and group counseling services are continued telehealth, utilizing HIPAA-compliant Zoom. Telehealth services are available. When they can evaluate the safety and therapeutic efficacy of the logistics more confidently, they will offer a hybrid model of remote/in-person counseling services.
Due to COVID-19, most of their work will be done virtually. They are currently working at 30% capacity. Please contact them through their website, Facebook, email, or their phone number.
es: Debido a COVID-19, la mayor parte de la labor de ANADE se está haciendo de forma virtual. Actualmente están trabajando al 30% de su capacidad. Si desea contactarlos, por favor de mandarles un mensaje a través de su sitio web, Facebook, correo electrónico o por llamada telefónica.

en: Due to COVID-19, all individuals, including families experiencing homelessness, are asked to go to the Delta Welcome Center to get basic services, which include lodging, three meals a day, access to showers and laundry services, among others. Upon arrival, everyone— including prospective clients, are screened for symptoms of COVID-19 before entering the buildings. Any person exhibiting symptoms will immediately be placed in isolation before being sent to get tested. Upon completing the intake process, individuals/families are safely placed in shelters in the community or an apartment of their own.
es: Debido a COVID-19, a todos los individuos, incluyendo familias, experimentando falta de hogar, se les pedi que se dirijan al centro de bienvenida Delta para recibir servicios básicos, que incluye hospedaje, tres comidas al día, acceso a duchas y servicios de lavandería, entre otros. Al llegar, todos - incluyendo clientes perspectivos, son evaluados por síntomas de COVID-19 antes de entrar al edificio.

en:
The El Concilio offices are opened 
If you are in need of financial assistance during the crisis, are a resident of Kalamazoo County, and do not qualify for federal aid:
CALL 211 to fill out an application for financial assistance.
es:
Se abren las oficinas de El Concilio
Si necesita asistencia financiera durante la crisis, es residente del condado de Kalamazoo y no califica para ayuda federal:
LLAME AL 211 para llenar una solicitud de asistencia financiera.

en: Indiana Legal Services offices are open again. However, they are also get legal help online. Visit the link to learn how to get virtual legal help https://www.indianalegalservices.org/applyonline
es: Las oficinas de Servicios Legales de Indiana están abiertas nuevamente. Sin embargo, también reciben ayuda legal en línea. Visite el enlace para saber cómo obtener ayuda legal virtual https://www.indianalegalservices.org/applyonline

en: Due to Covid-19, Sin Fronteras IAP is offering their services virtually.
es: Debido a Covid-19, Sin Fronteras IAP está ofreciendo sus servicios virtualmente.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, service hours have changed. The Secretaría is open from 9:00 am to 2:00 pm. Only a limited number of people are allowed in the building at a certain time.
es: Debido a la pandemia del COVID-19, las horas de servicio han cambiado. La Secretaría está abierta de 9:00 am a 2:00 pm. Solo un número limitado de personas tiene permitido entrar al edificio.

en:
Due to COVID-19, FM4 Paso Libre is offering an overnight stay at the Migrant and Refugee Care Center instead of the 3-day emergency housing service. They still provide food and showers to migrants as they pass through the city.

Workshops are have been reinstated.
es:
Debido al COVID-19, FM4 Paso Libre está ofreciendo una pernoctación (de una noche) en el Centro de Atención a Migrantes y Refugiados en lugar del servicio de alojamiento de emergencia por 3 días. Todavía ofrecen sus servicios de comida y duchas a los migrantes pasando por la ciudad.

Están otra vez ofreciendo talleres.

en: Due to the COVID-19 crisis, clients must call to make an appointment.
es: Debido a la crisis del COVID-19, los clientes deben llamar para hacer una cita.

en: Due to limited resources, The Cornell Law School Advocacy for LGBT Communities Clinic can only take on new cases at certain times of the year. If they cannot be of assistance, the Cornell Law School Advocacy for LGBT Communities Clinic will refer potential clients to another organization that may be able to help.
es: Debido a los recursos limitados, la Clínica de la Promoción de las Comunidades LGBT del Cornell Law School sólo puede tomar casos nuevos en ciertas épocas del año. Si no pueden ser de ayuda, la clínica referirá a clientes potenciales a otra organización que pueda ayudar.

en: Colectivo SerES continues to offer its services during the COVID-19 pandemic while complying with health protocols.  Some services may require scheduling an appointment in advance.
es: El Colectivo SerES continúa ofreciendo sus servicios durante la pandemia del COVID-19, siguiendo los protocolos de salud. Para acceder a algunos de los servicios se requiere agendar una cita con anticipación.

en: Because of the pandemic, AVE de México is not holding face-to-face activities. The workshops taught will be held virtually until further notice. The best way to contact them is through Facebook Messenger for the time being.
es: Debido a la pandemia, AVE de México no está realizando actividades presenciales. Los talleres que imparten se están llevando a cabo de manera virtual. La mejor manera de ponerse en contacto con ellos es a través de Facebook Messenger por el momento.

en: The COVID-19 pandemic has caused short delays in response time to phone calls and emails. Please consider contacting the specific department you would like to reach or be prepared to wait a few days for a response.
es: La pandemia de COVID-19 ha causado breves retrasos en el tiempo de respuesta a llamadas telefónicas y correos electrónicos. Considere comunicarse con el departamento específico al que le gustaría comunicarse o prepárese para esperar unos días para obtener una respuesta.

en: KAN-WIN is taking every action necessary to ensure the safety and well-being of our survivors, staff, supporters and community members. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us via our 24-hour hotline at 773-583-0880. In addition, our staff are available 9am-5pm during weekdays via office phone at 847-299-1392. You may also reach us at info@kanwin.org.

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Fuera del Clóset is offering most of its services virtually. The HIV testing service has been put on hold for the time being. Visit their Facebook page for more information.
es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, Fuera del Clóset ofrece sus servicios de manera virtual. El servicio de pruebas de VIH está en pausa por el momento. Visite su página de Facebook para obtener más información.

en: Before staying at the shelter, those in need will need to quarantine at a nearby location for a period of 14 days.
es: Antes de quedarse en el albergue, les necesitades tendrán que hacer cuarentena en un lugar cercano durante un período de 14 días.

en: Because of the pandemic, you must make an appointment to receive services. You can make one through the Facebook page or by calling the number provided.
es: En el contexto de la pandemia, necesita tener una cita previa, la cual pueden realizar por la página de Facebook o en el teléfono que aparece.

en: Contact Rainbow Bridge for information on current capacity.
es: Contacte con Rainbow Bridge para más información sobre su capacidad actual.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, safety measures have been put in place. Masks must be worn at all times, and appointments are required.
es: Debido a la pandemia del COVID-19, se han implementado ciertas medidas sanitarias. Se debe utilizar cubrebocas en todo momento, y no se atiende personas sin cita.

en: Because of the high number of migrants and the pandemic, access to Casa del Migrante's services is restricted. An appointment is required before going to the organization's location.
es: Debido al alto número de migrantes y por la pandemia el acceso a la Casa del Migrante es restringido. Una cita programada es necessario antes de que llege.

en: All services are currently available by appointment only due to the ongoing pandemic.
es: Todos los servicios están actualmente disponibles solo con cita previa debido a la pandemia en curso.

en: Though offices are closed to the public to prevent the spread of the COVID-19 virus, help is still available.
es: Aunque las oficinas están cerradas al público para evitar la propagación del virus COVID-19, todavía hay ayuda disponible.

en: In an effort to help prevent the spread of COVID-19, CRIS is not currently receiving walk-ins at their office and most staff are working remotely.
es: En un esfuerzo por ayudar a prevenir la propagación de COVID-19, CRIS actualmente no recibe visitas sin cita previa en su oficina y la mayoría del personal trabaja de forma remota.

en: Both Health Clinics are canceled until further notice. Follow the link to learn about nonprofit opening during COVID-19: https://hungernetwork.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/COVID-19_Pantry-Resource-Packet.pdf
es: Ambas Clínicas de Salud quedan canceladas hasta nuevo aviso. Sigue el enlace para obtener información sobre la apertura de organizaciones sin fines de lucro durante COVID-19: https://hungernetwork.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/COVID-19_Pantry-Resource-Packet.pdf

en: Y.O.U. is currently operating virtually. Follow the link to their Facebook page to keep up to date on events.
es: TÚ. actualmente está operando virtualmente. Siga el enlace a su página de Facebook para mantenerse actualizado sobre los eventos.

en:
Due to the pandemic and Covid-19, the hours are as follows:
Monday-Friday
10:00 - 18:00
es:
Debido a la contingencia sanitaria y COVID-19 las horas del horario son los siguientes:
Lunes-Viernes
10:00 - 18:00

en: To prevent the spread of COVID-19, BYC staff is providing services using social distancing, over the phone, and online.
Covid-19 Response : https://www.chicagowomenshealthcenter.org/covid19

The Boston Center for Refugee Health & Human Rights (BCRHHR) is back to seeing people in-person as well as virtually over video.  If you are currently in treatment and would like to make an appointment, please reach out to your provider directly or call the front desk at (617) 414-4749.  For new patients, please call (617) 414-1994 to schedule an appointment.
es: El Centro de Boston para la Salud y los Derechos Humanos de les Refugiades (BCRHHR, por sus siglas en inglés) ha vuelto a ver a las personas en persona y virtualmente por video. Si actualmente estás en tratamiento y deseas programar una cita, comunícate directamente con tu proveedor o llama a la recepción al (617) 414-4749. Para pacientes nueves, llama al (617) 414-1994 para programar una cita.

en: Services are still running remotely, except for housing services, which are running uninterrupted. Remote services require an appointment
es: Los servicios aún se ejecutan de forma remota, excepto los servicios de vivienda, que se ejecutan sin interrupciones. Los servicios remotos requieren una cita

en: Huckleberry House is committed to maintaining a safe and healthy environment for our young people and adults alike. Steps to prevent the introduction and spread of COVID-19 include: screenings before entering the youth shelter, teletherapy, remote interactions, closed administration offices, etc.
es: Casa Huckleberry se compromete a mantener un entorno seguro y saludable para nuestres jóvenes y adultes por igual. Los pasos para prevenir la introducción y propagación de COVID-19 incluyen: exámenes antes de ingresar al refugio para jóvenes, teleterapia, interacciones remotas, oficinas administrativas cerradas, etc.

en: Visit https://www.aidschicago.org/page/news/all-news/afc-coronavirus-announcement for COVID-19 resources and information to keep safe, healthy, and informed.
es: Visita https://www.aidschicago.org/page/news/all-news/afc-coronavirus-announcement para obtener información y recursos de COVID-19 para mantenerte seguro, saludable e informado.

en: The Right to Immigration Institute website is currently undergoing updates. For any immigration concerns, please call (781) 209-0183 or email intakes@therighttoimmigration.org
Due to COVID-19, most appointments will be held remotely via Zoom. In-person meetings will be held when signatures are required.
es: Debido a COVID-19, la mayoría de las citas se realizarán de forma remota a través de Zoom. Las reuniones en persona se llevarán a cabo cuando se requieran firmas.

en: Wexner Medical Center has instituted new visitor policies as well as telehealth communication, Follow the link for more information on how your visit may be impacted: https://wexnermedical.osu.edu/features/coronavirus/patient-care/visitor-policy
es: Wexner Medical Center ha instituido nuevas políticas para visitantes, así como comunicación de telesalud. Siga el enlace para obtener más información sobre cómo puede verse afectada su visita: https://wexnermedical.osu.edu/features/coronavirus/patient-care/visitor-policy

en: NEW Health's North End site in-person Saturday morning urgent care visits have resumed, these are by appointment for adult and pediatric patients. The hours are 08:00am - 12:00pm; and same day appointments can be made by calling 617-643-8000. Please be aware that masks are still required in all health care settings; and they cannot evaluate patients in-person with COVID-type symptoms, regardless of vaccination status. Should you need care for such symptoms, they will be able to assist you by phone to determine the best care plan for your situation.
es: Se han reanudado las visitas de atención de urgencia en persona en el sitio de NEW Health's North End los sábados por la mañana, estas son con cita previa para pacientes adultos y pediátricos. El horario es de 08:00 a. m. a 12:00 p. m.; y se pueden hacer citas para el mismo día llamando al 617-643-8000. Ten en cuenta que todavía se requieren máscaras en todos los entornos de atención médica; y no pueden evaluar personalmente a les pacientes con síntomas tipo COVID, independientemente del estado de vacunación. Si necesitas atención para dichos síntomas, podrán ayudarte por teléfono para determinar el mejor plan de atención para su situación.

en: Appointments must be scheduled for clients living with HIV and the GBT Health Clinic, PrEP Clinic patients, and clients needing HIV testing.
es: Se deben programar citas para clientes que viven con el VIH y la Clínica de Salud GBT, pacientes de la Clínica PrEP y clientes que necesitan pruebas de VIH.

en: Northeast Legal Aid and its subsidiary Northeast Justice Center are open by appointment only. To apply for assistance please call them Monday through Friday 09:00 am to 13:00 pm at 978-458-1465 or apply online anytime. https://northeastlegalaid.wufoo.com/forms/x7vyx3q1mhit3u/
es: Northeast Legal Aid y su subsidiaria Northeast Justice Center están abiertos solo con cita previa. Para solicitar asistencia, llámales de lunes a viernes de 09:00 am a 13:00 pm al 978-458-1465 o solicita en línea en cualquier momento. https://northeastlegalaid.wufoo.com/forms/x7vyx3q1mhit3u/

en: Due to the COVID-19 crisis, all CMAA locations will be open by appointment only until further notice. Please call to make appointment.
es: Debido a la crisis de COVID-19, todas las ubicaciones de CMAA estarán abiertas solo con cita previa hasta nuevo aviso. Por favor llame para hacer una cita.

en: Wellness Center is a paperless organization. The patient will need to bring a charged phone or device with internet service. Patients will register a free account on their platform.

Due to COVID-19, MWLS staff is working remotely, however, the physical office is in the process of a phased reopening. Clients should still contact MWLS by phone or email. No walk-ins will be accepted at this time.
es: Debido a COVID-19, el personal de MWLS está trabajando de forma remota; sin embargo, la oficina física está en proceso de reapertura gradual. Les clientes aún deben comunicarse con MWLS por teléfono o correo electrónico. No se aceptarán visitas sin cita en este momento.

en: Please call 617-323-4440 to schedule COVID-19 testing or vaccine appointment. Testing is by appointment only; they reach capacity daily and are unable to accept walk-ups.
es: Llama al 617-323-4440 para programar una cita para la prueba o la vacuna COVID-19. Las pruebas son solo con cita previa; alcanzan su capacidad todos los días y no pueden aceptar visitas sin cita previa.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, KhushDC's support group is being held remotely via conference call. Many of KushDC's events are conducted and advertised through Facebook, a remote platform. Some events are in-person.
Due to COVID, please check if their meetings are running each week on Facebook. Please email ahead of time to let them know you are coming and wear a mask.
On regular program days, the building is open for drop-in and the regular program schedule. Notice: Masks are strongly encouraged but not required. Free masks are available for teens and visitors.
es: En los días regulares del programa, el edificio está abierto para visitas y el horario regular del programa. Aviso: Se requerirán máscaras para todo el personal y les adolescentes en el edificio. Tanto KN95/N95 como las máscaras quirúrgicas se proporcionarán de forma gratuita.

en: AIDS Alabama's main offices will be closed with the exception of confirmed appointments to meet with social work staff. They will continue to provide all social services, housing assistance, and HIV testing to clients. Contact their office for more information.
Birmingham AIDS Outreach is still offering services with limited hours and precautions in place to prevent the spread of COVID-19. Check their website for more information.
Some services are online or have taken appropriate health measures for contingency.
es: Algunos servicios están en línea o han tomado las medidas sanitarias adecuadas por la contingencia.

en: Options for Sexual Health continues to offer services within clinics, following our COVID-19 safety plan. Even for clinic appointments, they may offer care via telephone assessment as a first choice to decrease asymptomatic COVID transmission risk. Please note that some clinics may have to change their schedules or close temporarily, so they encourage all patients to check the Clinic Finder and Clinic Closures pages before attending a clinic. Sex Sense is open as usual, Monday to Friday 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

COVID-19 Policy: visit the website for a list of all the services that are still being offered (http://www.asiaohio.org/covid-19-update/). 

Some services still being offered include: legal services, children and family services, sustainability services, healthcare services, and interpretation services.
es: Política de COVID-19: visita el sitio web para obtener una lista de todos los servicios que aún se ofrecen (http://www.asiaohio.org/covid-19-update/).

en: COVID-19 Update: Visit the website for updated policies and protocols (https://www.starhouse.us/post/covid-19-our-plan-to-keep-star-house-safe). Star House remains open during the pandemic, with added health and safety measures to ensure faculty and guest safety.
es: Actualización de COVID-19: visite el sitio web para conocer las políticas y los protocolos actualizados (https://www.starhouse.us/post/covid-19-our-plan-to-keep-star-house-safe). Casa Estrella permanece abierta durante la pandemia, con medidas adicionales de salud y seguridad para garantizar la seguridad de les profesores y les invitades.

en: The playground is currently closed due to state regulations.

We currently need volunteers at the Bus Station in Brownsville, Texas. Given COVID restrictions we prefer local volunteers or those who can commit to a sustained presence and volunteer for at least a week. If you are interested in volunteering, please contact volunteer@teambrownsville.org and we can schedule opportunities for you to work.
es: Actualmente necesitamos voluntarios en la Estación de Autobuses en Brownsville, Texas. Dadas las restricciones de COVID, preferimos voluntarios locales o aquellos que puedan comprometerse con una presencia sostenida y ser voluntarios durante al menos una semana. Si está interesado en ser voluntario, comuníquese con voluntario@teambrownsville.org y podemos programar oportunidades para que trabaje.

en: Healing Transitions takes the COVID-19 outbreak seriously and has been working closely with local and national health officials. Most services are operating as normal, but for more information on how Healing Transitions is responding to the coronavirus outbreak, please visit their COVID-19 response webpage. https://healing-transitions.org/flags/
es: Transiciones Sanadoras (Healing Transitions) se toma en serio el brote de COVID-19 y ha estado trabajando en estrecha colaboración con los funcionarios de salud locales y nacionales. La mayoría de los servicios funcionan con normalidad, pero para obtener más información sobre cómo Transiciones Sanadoras está respondiendo al brote de coronavirus, visita su página web de respuesta al COVID-19. https://healing-transitions.org/flags/

en: Routine appointments are suspended to minimize exposure risk, but the Elgin and Aurora Open Door Health Centers are open to address any and all issues by phone.

Triangle PLUS at The LGBT Center of Raleigh is physically closed for programs due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, but they continue to meet virtually! If you have questions or are seeking resources, you can call 919-832-4484 seven days a week between the hours of 12:00 pm and 16:00 pm, and your call will be answered by a staff member or volunteer, or you can email info@lgbtcenterofraleigh.com.
es: Triangulo PLUS en El Centro LGBT de Raleigh está físicamente cerrado para los programas debido a la actual pandemia de COVID-19, ¡pero continúan reuniéndose virtualmente! Si tiene preguntas o está buscando recursos, puede llamar al 919-832-4484 los siete días de la semana entre las 12:00 p. m. y las 16:00 p. puede enviar un correo electrónico a info@lgbtcenterofraleigh.com.

en: To help slow the spread of COVID-19, video and telephone based therapy is available.
All programs are virtual. The IUYA does not have a physical office.
es: Todos los programas son virtuales. El IUYA no cuenta con una oficina física.

en: Community support groups are now virtual due to COVID.
es: Los grupos de apoyo comunitario se llevarán acabo de forma virtual debido al COVID

en: Due to COVID-19, please call to make an appointment.
es: Debido a COVID-19, por favor llame para hacer una cita.

en:
Hours may be different due to Covid-19. 
Please call first.
Their location is not explicitly stated on their Facebook and website, so please contact them for further information on where they are located.
es: Su ubicación no está marcada en su Facebook y página web, entonces póngase en contacto con ellos para más información sobre en dónde ellos se ubican.

en: Due to COVID-19, some services are now offered virtually or by appointment only. Some sites have suspended drop-in hours, while others remain open. Please call in advance to confirm how services are operating.
es: Debido a COVID-19, algunos servicios ahora se ofrecen virtualmente o solo con cita previa. Algunos sitios han suspendido las horas de visita, mientras que otros permanecen abiertos. Llame con anticipación para confirmar cómo funcionan los servicios.

en: The SPOT's counseling services are no longer taking new clients due to a full capacity. All other medical services and the youth drop-in center are by appointment only until further notice.
es: Los servicios de consejería de SPOT ya no aceptan nueves clientes debido a su capacidad total. Todes les demás servicios médicos y el centro de acogida para jóvenes son solo con cita previa hasta nuevo aviso.

en: Classes and immigration services are offered online currently so that clients can access them during the COVID-19 pandemic. They will update clients when they will resume in-person services. Call for more information: 617-426-9492.
es: Actualmente, las clases y los servicios de inmigración se ofrecen en línea para que les clientes puedan acceder a ellos durante la pandemia de COVID-19. Actualizarán a les clientes cuando reanudarán los servicios en persona. Llama para más información: 617-426-9492.

en: ***Needs to confirm LGBTQ+ Affirming****
Need to confirm if LGBTQ+ Affirming
es: Necesita confirmar si afirma LGBTQ+

en: Offices are now open to visitors without appointment Monday to Friday, from 9am to 5pm. Face masks are required at all times. Visit the website for more information : https://communitylegal.org/get-help/covid-19-information-resources/
es: Las oficinas ahora están abiertas para visitantes sin cita previa de lunes a viernes, de 9 am a 5 pm. Se requieren máscaras faciales en todo momento. Visita el sitio web para obtener más información: https://communitylegal.org/get-help/covid-19-information-resources/

en: De Novo offices remain closed to the public in order to help slow the spread of the COVID-19 virus. All legal and counseling staff are working remotely with services being provided during regular business hours by video and phone call. Limited in-person meetings are held by appointment only. Massachusetts residents in need of legal advice on immigration matters can call their Immigration Hotline at (617) 405-5479 to request a free legal consultation with an attorney. If you are in need of legal or counseling services, call their Intake and Referral Line at 617-661-1010 from 09:00 a.m. to 17:00 p.m., Monday through Friday.
es: Las oficinas de De Novo permanecen cerradas al público para ayudar a frenar la propagación del virus COVID-19. Todo el personal legal y de asesoramiento está trabajando de forma remota y los servicios se brindan durante el horario comercial habitual por video y llamada telefónica. Las reuniones en persona limitadas se llevan a cabo solo con cita previa. Les residentes de Massachusetts que necesiten asesoramiento legal sobre asuntos de inmigración pueden llamar a la línea directa de inmigración al (617) 405-5479 para solicitar una consulta legal gratuita con une abogade. Si necesitas servicios legales o de asesoramiento, llama a su Línea de Admisión y Referencia al 617-661-1010 de 09:00 a. m. a 17:00 p. m., de lunes a viernes.

en: Since March 2020, KIND has been working hard to ensure the safety of child clients amid the many challenges COVID-19 presents to their lives and well-being. Attorneys have continued to represent clients in ongoing telephonic and video hearings, and they have continued to deploy creative and safe strategies to prepare clients’ cases and file essential applications and court filings to secure critical legal protections for the children they serve.
Due to COVID-19, the St. Louis Gender Foundation is not currently holding meetings.
es: Debido a COVID-19, la Fundación de Género de St. Louis no está realizando reuniones actualmente.

en: Due to COVID-19, Compass meetings are currently being held over Zoom. Dates and times remain the same, and are still restricted to people who can access Boston and would like to eventually come to in-person meetings. Contact their email for more information, including Zoom links.
es: Debido a COVID-19, las reuniones de Compass se están realizando actualmente a través de Zoom. Las fechas y los horarios siguen siendo los mismos y aún están restringidos a las personas que pueden acceder a Boston y que eventualmente les gustaría asistir a las reuniones en persona. Pónte en contacto con su correo electrónico para obtener más información, incluidos los enlaces de Zoom.

en: Due to Covid-19, Safe Harbor is offering Sunday worship both in-person and via Zoom.
es: Debido a Covid-19, Puerto Seguro ofrece culto dominical tanto en persona como a través de Zoom.

en: Everyone is required to wear a face mask at all times inside the building. One guest is allowed to accompany you into the building, but the guest may not accompany you to your appointment.
es: Es necesario que todas las personas lleven mascarilla en todo momento dentro de las instalaciones. Se permite que lxs pacientes vayan acompañadxs de UNA persona dentro del edificio, pero esta no podrá entrar a la cita.

en: If you have any COVID-19 symptoms or were exposed to it, message them through their patient portal or call them before coming to the clinic. Open Health is also offering COVID-19 vaccines at this time.
es: Para proteger a lxs pacientes y al personal, Open Health Care Clinic implementado un chequeo de COVID-19 a todxs lxs pacientes que acudan al centro. Si tienes síntomas de COVID-19 o has estado expuestx, envía un mensaje a través de su portal del paciente o llama antes de asistir a la clínica. Para evitar el contagio es imprescindible el uso de mascarilla, tanto por pacientes como acompañantes. Si no tienes mascarilla, se te dará una antes de entrar al edificio. Open Health también ofrece vacunas contra el COVID-19.

en:
NOTES: VAMOS! falls under the same guidelines that relate to public schools, so they are currently closed and unable to re-open until the government allows public schools to open. Currently they are providing groceries to families and in some cases, depending on the neighborhood, they are providing prepared meals to go.  
Please note that VAMOS! has 10 locations in Mexico, so they all have different hours of operation.
es:
ATENCIÓN: VAMOS! sigue las mismas pautas que las escuelas públicas, entonces actualmente están cerrados debido al COVID-19 y hasta que el gobierno abra las escuelas públicas, ellos no pueden abrir otra vez. Actualmente están repartiendo comestibles a familias y en algunos casos, dependiendo del vecindario, ellos están repartiendo comidas preparadas para llevar.
Por favor tome en cuenta que VAMOS! tiene 10 ubicaciones, entonces todas tienen diferentes horarios de trabajo.

en: Call (855) 624-7715 Tues-Thur 10:00-2:00 CST to connect
Services and Workshops have gone online and their Zoom Link for all their events is listed on their Linktree found in their Instagram Bio
es: Los servicios y talleres se han puesto en línea y su enlace de Zoom para todos sus eventos se encuentra en su Linktree que se encuentra en su biografía de Instagram

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the organization has moved and adjusted certain events and gatherings.
es: Debido al COVID 19, la organización ha relocalizado y cambiado algunos eventos y reuniones.

en: Church services on Facebook Live and in-person. MCCBR is taking safety measures due to COVID-19. These include social distancing while communion is self served with pre-packaged individual service wafers and grape juice, they are not passing the offering plate. Attendees may drop their tithes and gifts in the collection plate at the doors exiting the sanctuary. Masks are strongly recommended, but not required. Hand sanitizer is available in each bathroom and in the front lobby and back exit of the building.
es: Se puede atender a servicios eclesiásticos mediante facebook de forma online y en persona. La iglesia está tomando medidas de seguridad frente al covid-19: El distanciamiento durante la misa incluye paquetes individuales con hostias y jugo de uva, para evitar conglomeraciones. Los que asistan pueden depositar sus ofrendas a las salida en las puertas del santuario. Se recomienda el uso de mascarilla, pero su uso no es obligatorio. Gel bactericida está disponible en los baños, en la entrada principal y salida trasera del edificio.

en: Due to COVID-19, ATASK's office is closed for the foreseeable future and services are being provided remotely. Their emergency shelter remains open.
es: Debido a COVID-19, la oficina de ATASK está cerrada en el futuro previsible y los servicios se brindan de forma remota. Su refugio de emergencia permanece abierto.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, some in-person services provided by Planned Parenthood may be moved virtually.
es: Debido al COVID-19, algunos servicios han pasado de realizarse en persona a ser atendidos de forma virtual.

en: For the protection of health and safety due to COVID-19, MassMATCH partners may have modified how they carry out their device loan, device demonstration and reuse program operations. Please reach out to them directly for details specific to their programs (at the links).
es: Para la protección de la salud y la seguridad debido al COVID-19, les socies de MassMATCH pueden haber modificado la forma en que llevan a cabo las operaciones del programa de préstamo de dispositivos, demostración y reutilización de dispositivos. Comunícate con elles directamente para obtener detalles específicos de sus programas (en los enlaces).

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, some in-person services provided by Planned Parenthood may be moved virtually.
es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, algunos servicios en persona proporcionados por  Planificación Familiar  pueden trasladarse virtualmente.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, certain events and gatherings may be postponed or cancelled.
es: Debido al covid-19, algunos eventos y reuniones puede que se pospongan o sean canceladas.

en: Visit the website for more updates information on the COVID-19 crisis. Currently the office is closed but new clients can still access services. COVID-19 Policy Website: https://cincinnatiworks.org/adjusting-our-services-during-covid-19-emergency/
es: Visita el sitio web para obtener más información actualizada sobre la crisis de COVID-19. Actualmente la oficina está cerrada pero les nueves clientes aún pueden acceder a los servicios. Sitio web de la política de COVID-19: https://cincinnatiworks.org/adjusting-our-services-while-covid-19-emergency/

es: Debido a Covid-19, algunos eventos pueden realizarse de forma remota o modificarse de otra manera. Por favor llame con anticipación.

en: BHCHP has coordinated 26 Covid-19 vaccination sites for those suffering from homelessness and continues to conduct COVID-19 testing at their shelter partners and care for COVID-positive patients at their medical respite facility, the Barbara McInnis House. BHCHP's regular clinics and services are operating in-person or virtually, depending on patient need.
es: BHCHP ha coordinado 26 sitios de vacunación de Covid-19 para personas sin hogar y continúa realizando pruebas de COVID-19 en sus refugios asociados y atiende a pacientes con COVID-positivo en su centro de descanso médico, Barbara McInnis House. Las clínicas y los servicios habituales de BHCHP funcionan en persona o virtualmente, según las necesidades de le paciente.

en:
COVID-19 Update: 
LIMITED SERVICE HOURS: 
Wednesday — Saturday: 9am–11am
Thursday evenings: 6:30–8pm
**Limited services available (see website for updates).
es:

en: As they begin to welcome back staff members who have been off-site since March and re-engage guests in improved programming, they’re continuing to adapt while taking every precaution. In addition to distributing clean face masks every day at the front door and ensuring hand sanitizer is readily available, they’ve installed plexiglass dividers, distance-markers, and signs in English and Spanish on the floors and walls. Visit the link to learn more about their COVID-19 protocols: https://stfrancishouse.org/covid19/
es: A medida que comienzan a dar la bienvenida a les miembres del personal que han estado fuera del sitio desde marzo y vuelven a involucrar a les invitades en una programación mejorada, continúan adaptándose mientras toman todas las precauciones. Además de distribuir máscaras faciales limpias todos los días en la puerta principal y garantizar que haya desinfectante para manos disponible, instalaron divisores de plexiglás, marcadores de distancia y letreros en inglés y español en los pisos y paredes. Visita el enlace para obtener más información sobre sus protocolos COVID-19: https://stfrancishouse.org/covid19/

en: Masks are required to visit the center and walk-in services are suspended.
es: Se requieren máscaras para visitar el centro y se suspenden los servicios sin cita previa.

en:
In order to contribute to the Quebec government's efforts to limit the spread of the virus, CLAM invites you to limit travel to their offices and to use their online services instead.
Download the application on your mobile and register and the CLAM will validate your information to offer you support. An app that will connect you directly with CLAM's staff. This app is available for Android and iOS mobile devices.
es:
Afin de contribuer aux efforts du gouvernement du Québec visant à limiter la propagation du virus, CLAM vous invite à limiter les déplacements à leurs bureaux et à privilégier l'utilisation de leurs services en ligne.
Téléchargez l'application sur votre mobile et inscrivez-vous et le CLAM validera votre information pour vous offrir un accompagnement. Une app qui vous connectera directement avec les intervenants du CLAM. Cette app est disponible pour les appareils mobiles Android et iOS.

en: Codman Square Health is currently offering comprehensive monkeypox education as well as vaccinations and testing. Visit their website for more information.
es: Salud de Codman Square (Codman Square Health) actualmente ofrece educación integral sobre la viruela del mono, así como vacunas y pruebas. Visita su sitio web para más información.

en: Due to high demand, IHELP is currently limited to intaking 5 new student referrals per month. Call as early in the month as possible to put an individual on the list (314-771-1104).
es: Debido a la gran demanda, IHELP actualmente se limita a recibir referencias de 5 nuevos estudiantes por mes. Llame lo antes posible en el mes para poner a una persona en la lista (314-771-1104).

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, currently services are being held virtually and by appointment only.
es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, actualmente los servicios se llevan a cabo virtualmente y solo con cita previa.

en: Due to COVID-19, all services are currently mobile and they are not currently offering HIV or Hepatitis C testing.

They will continue to offer essential life-sustaining services to people they serve, while adhering to CDC guidelines to reduce the spread of COVID-19. Click here for updates and more information https://bayviewci.org/coronavirus-covid-19-updates-from-the-foundation/

During COVID-19, the Steps Alano Club is offering both in-person and online meetings. If you would like to attend a meeting at the Club house, you must follow safety procedures listed on their website. Online meetings may not be available for all groups.
es: Durante COVID-19, Club Pasos Alano ofrece reuniones en persona y en línea. Si desea asistir a una reunión en la Casa Club, debe seguir los procedimientos de seguridad que se enumeran en su sitio web.

en: WomanKind is currently operating with limited staff. Please call the helpline (1-888-888-7702) first to confirm office hours.
es: Las oficinas de la comunidad están actualmente cerradas hasta nuevo aviso

en: Due to COVID-19, the Translatinx Network office is closed to walk-in appointments and some services are being offered virtually. The Community Closet is temporarily closed due to COVID-19. Call the main office to schedule an appointment for in-person services.
es: Debido a COVID-19, la oficina de Translatinx Network está cerrada para citas sin cita previa y algunos servicios se ofrecen virtualmente. El armario comunitario está cerrado temporalmente debido a COVID-19.

en: Live Oak’s offices remain physically closed for the foreseeable future due to the COVID-19 pandemic, but telehealth services continue to be offered.
The main office is currently closed. Visit the website, call or send an email to get assistance.
es: La oficina principal está cerrada en este momento. Visite el sitio web, llame o envíe un correo electrónico para conseguir ayuda.

en: All services are open with COVID-19 measure in place, call 860-278-4163 to find out what services currently require appointments.
es: Todos los servicios están abiertos con la medida COVID-19 vigente, llame al 860-278-4163 para averiguar qué servicios actualmente requieren citas.

en:
In compliance with the most recent COVID-19 Public Health Department's - Revised and Extended Shelter in Place orders, the Center will remain closed for drop-ins. We are currently providing masked in-person support groups on-site and direct assistance to our community by appointment only. Drop-ins will resume when
it is deemed safer to do so. Go to https://www.oaklandlgbtqcenter.org/covid-19 for more Covid-19 updates.
In order to comply with government measures, access to their office is by appointment, or according to their calendar of activities. Many of their services are still active by phone.
Medworks has potentially moved locations and the updated location is not yet listed on their website.
Due to COVID-19, the shelter is currently not open, but free daily meal service is still ongoing.
es: Debido a la COVID-19, el refugio no está abierto actualmente, pero el servicio de comidas diarias gratuitas sigue en curso.

en: Many of TCC's services are virtual and in-person at this time. Please look at their website for more details: https://www.ctpridecenter.org/
es: Muchos de los servicios de TCC son virtuales y en persona en este momento. Consulte su sitio web para obtener más detalles: https://www.ctpridecenter.org/

en: Due to COVID-19, AIDS Delaware is only seeing people by appointment. Staff is primarily working remotely but is available in the office as needed. Masks are required at both locations. Events for The Village are all online. Rapid HIV testing is currently available by appointment only at their Wilmington location.
es: Debido a COVID-19, AIDS Delaware solo atiende a personas con cita previa. El personal trabaja principalmente de forma remota, pero está disponible en la oficina según sea necesario. Se requieren máscaras en ambos lugares. Los eventos de The Village están todos en línea. Actualmente, la prueba rápida del VIH está disponible solo con cita previa en su ubicación de Wilmington.

en:
COVID-19: currently the only testing available at the at-home test kits which can be mailed to the organization's mailing address.
All patients must be vaccinated and wear a face mask/covering while in the facility.
es: COVID-19: actualmente la única prueba disponible en los kits de prueba en el hogar que se pueden enviar por correo a la dirección postal de la organización.

en: Demand for Case Management services has been high; contact to ensure there is availability.
es: La demanda de servicios de gestión de casos ha sido alta; Ponte en contacto para asegurar que hay disponibilidad.

en: Due to COVID-19, all clients will be screened for symptoms and asked about their travel status prior to coming into the office. If you have a fever, cough, shortness of breath, have possibly had close contact with someone with COVID-19, or have traveled internationally or to an area of the US with high rates of infection within the past 14 days, please call 603-225-2739 before coming to the office.
es: Debido a COVID-19, todes les clientes serán evaluades para detectar síntomas y se les preguntará sobre su estado de viaje antes de ingresar a la oficina. Si tiene fiebre, tos, dificultad para respirar, posiblemente haya tenido contacto cercano con alguien con COVID-19 o haya viajado internacionalmente o a un área de los EE. UU. con altas tasas de infección en los últimos 14 días, llame al 603- 225-2739 antes de venir a la oficina.

en:
Unfortunately, their capacity for new client intakes is currently limited; next available appointments are in 2023. Despite this, they encourage all eligible prospective clients to fill out this form and they will get back to you at their soonest availability. We hope that in the coming months they will fill new positions that will allow them to attend to your needs in a more timely manner.

**If you are currently experiencing a crisis, please call NYC WELL (888-692-9355) to be connected with a counselor. NYC-WELL is available 24/7.

**If you are in an emergency, please call 911 or visit your nearest emergency room.
Due to COVID-19, counseling and legal services are being provided virtually. The emergency shelter remains open and their 24-hour hotline remains operational.
es: Debido a COVID-19, servicios legales y de terapia se realizan virtualmente. El albergue de emergencia permanece abierto y su línea telefónica de las 24 horas sigue operando.

en: Having been inundated with a larger than normal amount of requests, it is taking them a moment to clear their request backlog.
es: Habiendo sido inundados con una cantidad de solicitudes mayor a la normal, les está tomando un momento eliminar su acumulación de solicitudes.

en: Visit checkhimout.ca/covid19 as hours and services are all subject to change in response to the Covid-19 pandemic. The New West, Surrey, and Abbotsford locations are not currently operating.
Erie House is currently in Phase 4 of their reopening plan. http://eriehouse.org/reopen/

As coronavirus (COVID-19) continues to impact communities globally, Legal Services for Children continues to serve its clients and still offer services for those who need legal guidance or referrals. Based on guidelines from the World Health Organization and state government, their office remains closed to the public; however, they continue to offer services by phone.
* Due to the health contingency caused by COVID-19, some institutions may see their activities limited. For this reason, we recommend that you check before going to them.
es: * Debido a la contingencia de salud causada por COVID-19, es posible que algunas instituciones limiten sus actividades. Por este motivo, le recomendamos que consulte antes de acudir a ellos.

en:
COVID-19-Related Service Update
They are continuing to provide responsive legal services at this time. Please call 510-548-4040 to schedule a free legal consultation in the areas of housing, health, immigration, education and economic security. Their in-person clinics will remain closed until further notice.
All staff and guests will be required to wear masks when on site at HHC, with social distancing and other COVID-19 safety measures in place.
es: Se requiere que todo el personal y los invitados usen máscaras cuando estén en el sitio en HHC, con distanciamiento social y otras medidas de seguridad de COVID-19 vigentes.

en: COVID-19: All events are currently virtual

In response to the dramatic impact of COVID-19 on many of Long Island’s communities, Project Safety Net has developed online groups to support the needs of its clients and to provide safe environments for connecting and sharing, but virtual groups are currently on break.
es: Debido al impact de COVID-19 (coronavirus), están posponiendo horas de Safe Space hasta nuevo aviso. Los grupos de apoyo también están actualmente en receso.

en: Due to COVID-19, the Lovering Health Center is requiring masks upon entry and only allowing patients inside their building. All services are by appointment only. They are also offering telehealth appointments at this time.

en: With the level of COVID-19 cases on campus and in the surrounding region remaining low, Stanford is updating masking requirements. Community members are also encouraged to stay current on COVID immunizations.
es: Dado que el nivel de casos de COVID-19 en el campus y en la región circundante se mantiene bajo, Stanford está actualizando los requisitos de uso de mascarillas. También se alienta a les miembres de la comunidad a mantenerse al día con las vacunas contra el COVID.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, certain events have been moved to a virtual platform. Additionally, the website for the organization is not actively updated, so please directly contact the organization for further details on services.
es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, ciertos eventos se han trasladado a una plataforma virtual. Además, el sitio web de la organización no se actualiza activamente, así que comuníquese directamente con la organización para obtener más detalles sobre los servicios.

en: Referrals are accepted from attorneys only. If you are an attorney representing an asylum seeker, please email to discuss an evaluation.
es: Solo se aceptan referencias de abogados. Si es un abogado que representa a un solicitante de asilo, envíe un correo electrónico para discutir una evaluación.

en: The Center currently does not offer walk-in appointments.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, some services and events are currently virtual. Please call or email ahead of arrival to service location.
es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, algunos servicios y eventos actualmente son virtuales. Llama o envía un correo electrónico antes de su llegada a la ubicación del servicio.

en:
Due to COVID-19 precautions, the CLASI’s offices are closed with staff working from home, allowing the organization to remain fully operational. Intakes are by phone only, call the appropriate office. 

Kent County: 302-674-8500. 
New Castle County: 302-575-0660. 
Sussex County: 302-856-0038.
es: La misión de Community Legal Aid Society, Inc. es combatir la injusticia a través de una defensa legal civil creativa y persistente en nombre de los habitantes de Delaware vulnerables y desatendidos. Brindan servicios legales gratuitos a personas con discapacidades, ciudadanos mayores, víctimas de discriminación en la vivienda, personas que viven en la pobreza, víctimas de violencia doméstica e inmigrantes víctimas de delitos, abuso y negligencia. CLASI puede brindar servicios de inmigración a quienes han sido víctimas de violencia doméstica u otros delitos, ayudándolos a obtener la ciudadanía a través de los programas especiales de visa.

en: Unvaccinated people must wear masks if in their facilities.
Due to COVID-19, CPRF is not open for walk-ins at the moment. Please call ahead for an appointment.
es: Debido a COVID-19, CPRF no está abierto para visitas sin cita en este momento. Por favor llame con anticipación para una cita.

en: CLA is committed to serving its clients during difficult times.  To protect the health and safety of the staff and clients CLA remain open to the public, by appointment ONLY.  CLA can no longer accommodate walk-ins, and are often working remotely, please call in advance. Masks are required for in-person meetings. Tele-service is available by phone and video.
es: CLA está comprometida a servir a sus clientes durante tiempos difíciles. Para proteger la salud y la seguridad del personal y de los clientes, CLA permanece abierta al público, sólo con cita previa. CLA ya no puede acomodar paseos y a menudo están trabajando de forma remota, por favor llame con antelación.

en: Some locations are closed until further notice, available by appointment only.
es: Alguna ubicaciones están cerrada hasta nuevo aviso, disponibles solo por cita previa.

en: In-office visits for routine care have resumed, with COVID-19 safety measures in effect. For patients that are at high-risk or those who are not comfortable coming to the office at this time, Telehealth visits will continue to be offered. Please visit their website for updated safety procedures.

Para los pacientes que están en alto riesgo o aquellos que no se sienten cómodos viniendo a la oficina en este momento, se seguirán ofreciendo visitas de Telesalud. Visite su sitio web para conocer los procedimientos de seguridad actualizados.

en: Due to COVID-19, some counseling groups and workshops are currently being done via phone or Zoom. Check each event for details.
es: Debido a COVID-19, algunos grupos de asesoramiento y talleres se están realizando actualmente por teléfono o Zoom.

en: Worship is now being offered in-person, however there is still an option to stream services online through facebook.

en: This organization is following all COVID-19 protocols, please visit their website for details.
es: Esta organización sigue todos los protocolos COVID-19, visite su sitio web para obtener más detalles.

en: FHCHC offers both COVID vaccines and free COVID testing at 374 Grande Avenue. Testing is available Monday-Friday 8am-9am. Vaccinations are by appointment only.
es: FHCHC ofrece tanto vacunas COVID como pruebas gratuitas de COVID en 374 Grande Avenue. Las pruebas están disponibles de lunes a viernes de 8 am a 9 am. Las vacunas son solo con cita previa.

en: The Gillespie Center & Hoskins Place reopened with COVID safety measures, but remain closed to the public. At this time, Homes with Hope is not accepting donations of furniture, clothing, and household items as they continue to follow health and safety protocols to protect their clients, staff, and community members.
es: El Gillespie Center & Hoskins Place reabrieron con medidas de seguridad por el COVID, pero permanecen cerrados al público. En este momento, Homes with Hope no acepta donaciones de muebles, ropa y artículos para el hogar, ya que continúan siguiendo los protocolos de salud y seguridad para proteger a sus clientes, personal y miembros de la comunidad.

en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the Fundación now offers remote workshops.
es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, ahora es posible asistir a los talleres virtualmente.

en: Due to the pandemic, the organization is not meeting in the physical office for right now.
es: Debido a la pandemia, la organización no se reunirá en la oficina física por ahora.

en: Due to COVID-19, the Coalition for the Homeless' Crisis Intervention walk-in services are temporarily closed. If you have a question about accessing shelter or other services, including if you have been denied access to shelter, please call the Crisis Intervention emergency hotline at 1-888-358-2384 and leave a detailed message, including your phone number. They will do their best to respond to you as soon as possible.
es: Debido a COVID-19, los servicios sin cita previa del Coalition for the Homeless' Crisis Intervention están cerrados temporalmente. Si tienes una pregunta sobre accediendo albergue y otros servicios, incluyendo si has sido negada al albergue, por favor llama la línea directa del Crisis Intervention a 1-888-358-2384 y deja un mensaje detallado, incluyendo tu número de teléfono. Harán todo lo posible para responder lo antes posible.

es: El Residential Shelter Program de Raphael House continuará sin interrupción durante la pandemia de COVID-19.

es: Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19, Refugee & Immigration Transitions ha cambiado a un formato virtual.

en:
Urgent Update on Gender-Affirming Care in Florida:
Planned Parenthood of South, East and North Florida is rescheduling gender-affirming care appointments. Before Florida's governor signed a new law attacking gender-affirming care, they took proactive measures with each of their patients to ensure minimal impact during this pause on services, and they will contact each patient to reschedule by June 12. PPSENFL is working diligently to make operational adjustments to comply with the new law, which now forbids their skilled and competent nurse practitioners from providing gender-affirming care.

If you need additional resources to cope with these changes, PPSENFL offers individual counseling and support groups for transgender patients and their loved ones. To learn more, call 561-472-9991 or go to: https://www.plannedparenthood.org/planned-parenthood-south-east-north-florida/medical-services/mental-health
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, all walk-in services at CLAS have been suspended. CLAS continues to provide service by telephone.

en:
As a response to the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic, each department has their own health and safety protocols implemented. Please check each individual page to receive updates on these measures.

During this time REACH continues to provide over the phone services and some groups continue to meet remotely.

REACH is now accepting in person appointments. Please call ahead to book an appointment.  Some of their mental health or support groups will remain closed or offered remotely while others are meeting outside during summertime where safe physical distancing can be achieved. Please call to find out which groups are meeting face to face.

For the continued safety of their patients and staff, they ask that you call ahead if you have the following symptoms: fever, cough, shortness of breath, or had exposure to someone who tested positive for COVID-19. Please continue to wear a mask to any of their clinics. If you do not have a mask, they will provide you with one. No FREE HIV/STI Walk-In Clinic Hours at Falls Community Health Until Further Notice. They are sorry for any inconvenience.
es: Para la seguridad continua de sus pacientes y personal, te piden que llames con anticipación si tienes los siguientes síntomas: fiebre, tos, dificultad para respirar o has estado expueste a alguien que dio positivo por COVID-19. Continúa usando una máscara en cualquiera de sus clínicas. Si no tienes mascarilla, te la facilitarán. No hay horas de clínica GRATUITA sin cita previa para VIH/ITS en Salud comunitaria Falls hasta nuevo aviso. Lamentan cualquier inconveniente.

en: Austin Front Runners continues to hold events; wearing masks is encouraged.

Due to the response to COVID-19, the Chicago Lights' building is closed except for limited curbside pickup on Tuesdays, 9:00 a.m.–12:00 p.m. Staff are adhering to and closely monitoring the guidelines still in place for working safely with youth from the Center for Disease Control, the Chicago Department of Health, and Chicago Public Schools. All staff members, volunteers, and participants are required to wear masks and maintain six feet of social distance at all times when on site. Regular hand washing is required, and hand sanitizer is readily available for use. Regular sanitization of tables, supplies, and doors occurs during programming.
es: Debido a la respuesta a la COVID-19, el edificio de Chicago Lights está cerrado, excepto para la recogida limitada en la acera los martes, de 9:00 a. m. a 12:00 p. m. El personal del Centro para el Control de Enfermedades, el Departamento de Salud de Chicago y las Escuelas Públicas de Chicago se está adhiriendo y monitoreando de cerca las pautas aún vigentes para trabajar de manera segura con jóvenes. Se requiere que todes les miembres del personal, voluntaries y participantes usen máscaras y mantengan seis pies de distancia social en todo momento cuando estén en el sitio. Se requiere lavarse las manos regularmente, y el desinfectante de manos está disponible para su uso. La desinfección regular de mesas, suministros y puertas se lleva a cabo durante la programación.

en: NOTE: The Sheridan Clinic does not test for Coronavirus.
